        Discs constructor that takes disc, client, filepath, and PrintWriter as parameters.
        Parameters:
        disc - disc on which given operations will be made
        client - client name for who given operations will be made
        file_path - path to file which is needed to be saved on server
        pw - stream which is used to communicate with client, to send him messages
